## policyIsDerivedRoles variable

Type guard to check if a [Policy](./core.policy.md) is a set of [DerivedRoles](./core.derivedroles.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
policyIsDerivedRoles: (policy: Policy) => policy is DerivedRoles
```
